Title: Relates to requiring staff and children enrolled in an overnight, children's non-regulated, summer day, or travelling camp to be vaccinated
Summary: Requires staff and children enrolled in an overnight, children's non-regulated, summer day, or travelling camp to be vaccinated against a specified list of diseases.
LawCode: Amd ยง1394, Pub Health L; amd ยง398-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the general business law, in relation to requiring children enrolled in an overnight, children's non-regulated, summer day, or travelling camp to be vaccinated
